name: Revoltin' Youth
description:
Revoltin' Youth is a new puzzle/platformer from Open Emotion Studios, creators of Mad Blocker Alpha and Ninjamurai. The evil Big-Wig has covered the characters town in crummy marketing gibberish. It's up to you to control the three characters through 50+ levels of headache inducing puzzles. The game features a unique pixel-art style and a robust chiptune soundtrack.

All works contained within are the copyright of Open Emotion Studios with the exception of the songs "Skyfire Ace" and "Black Dragon" which are copyright of Sabrepulse 2011, "GUH, City 1 + 2, Park 1 + 2, Dock 1 + 2 and Factory 1 + 2" which are the copyright of George and Jonathan 2011

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America.
